short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Site: Elevate your browsing by easily organizing and accessing favorite sites with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more losing that interesting article, or searching for the same site again and again.
Easily manage and save your favorite sites with Quick Site, and access it with ease!

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install 
Quick Site extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in the Privacy Policy & TOS.

Privacy Policy - https://evenaxismedia.com/Privacy-Policy/
Terms and Conditions - https://evenaxismedia.com/Terms/
